price: 6. Ciertamente, hemos adornado el cielo de este mundo con las estrellas
arabic: إِنَّا زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا بِزِينَةٍ ٱلۡكَوَاكِبِ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: innā zayyannā al-samāa al-dun'yā bizīnatin al-kawākibi
